appetizer.name: Lumpiang Shanghai
appetizer.description: Heaping pyramid of spring rolls filled with ground por, carrots, Chinese celery, and flavored with our secret spice blend. Comes with a sweet chili sauce.

appetizer.name: Tokwa't Baboy
appetizer.description: Tofu and pork deep fried together and served with a sweet and sour soy mix.

appetizer.name: Pritong Kangkong
appetizer.description: Water spinach leaves dried and fried in an airy pancake batter.

dessert.name: Turon
dessert.description: Bananas and caramelized jackfruit wrapped in a thin sheet of wheat, served with a caramel glaze and garnished with sesame seeds.
